name: Plug In
description:
Life can be dull in a low quality, dull reality. When you have gold, power, and a very high tech immersion rig, you can alter your view of existence. You are able to get more power and more gold, but you have to race to collect. 

Music by Collect001.
Graphics from Kenney Assets, GameDevArt, TokeGameArt, and a little Kennex flair every so often. 
Code and story from Kennex. 

There are some bugs.  I'll fix them when I can.  

https://github.com/kennex09/plug_in_pygame_easter_jam_high_tech
